title: [Stormpeak Base, Shimmer Lake]
description: Vivid accents of purple columbine and pink windflowers interspersed between lavish clumps of feather grass surround the lake and elicit a visual explosion alongside the dramatic blue-green water.  Rippling shadows of the silhouetted Dragonspine dance across the glassy surface, a natural camoflauge to the plentiful orefish that call this place home.  Thick with river birch and silver maples, the surrounding wetlands serve as a partial barricade from the gusting winds beyond the area's perimeter.
